query:
-- Jan Kowalski (UoP) - koszt 14457.60 zł, stawka pracownika 60 zł/h, klienta 120 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET hourlyRateEmployee = 6000, 
    hourlyRateClient = 12000,
    hourlyRateCost = 8606
WHERE firstName = 'Jan' AND lastName = 'Kowalski' AND employmentType = 'uop';

-- Anna Nowak (B2B) - koszt 15000 zł, stawka pracownika 80 zł/h, klienta 150 zł/h  
UPDATE employees 
SET hourlyRateEmployee = 8000,
    hourlyRateClient = 15000,
    hourlyRateCost = 8929
WHERE firstName = 'Anna' AND lastName = 'Nowak' AND employmentType = 'b2b';

-- Piotr Wiśniewski (UoP) - koszt 12048 zł, stawka pracownika 50 zł/h, klienta 100 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET hourlyRateEmployee = 5000,
    hourlyRateClient = 10000,
    hourlyRateCost = 7171
WHERE firstName = 'Piotr' AND lastName = 'Wiśniewski' AND employmentType = 'uop';

-- Maria Lewandowska (Zlecenie) - koszt 8000 zł, stawka pracownika 45 zł/h, klienta 90 zł/h
UPDATE employees 
SET hourlyRateEmployee = 4500,
    hourlyRateClient = 9000,
    hourlyRateCost = 4762
WHERE firstName = 'Maria' AND lastName = 'Lewandowska' AND employmentType = 'zlecenie';
